parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Markers

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Gets the marker brush. See [[setMarkerBrush]].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''markerBrush''' name

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> name: [[String]] -

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[if]] ('''markerBrush''' "Marker1" == "Solid") [[then]] {[[hint]] "Marker1 is solid!"}</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setMarkerBrush]], [[setMarkerBrushLocal]]
</value></part></template>
